name: Ahmed Hassan
testimonial: ISCF became my second family in America. The Bible studies helped me explore faith while the American families showed me genuine love and hospitality. I found not just friends, but lifelong connections.

name: Priya Sharma
testimonial: Coming from India, I was nervous about fitting in. ISCF welcomed me with open arms and helped me navigate American culture. The leadership opportunities helped me grow personally and professionally.

name: Carlos Silva
testimonial: The welcome banquets were incredible! Meeting over 1000 students and families in one place was amazing. ISCF taught me that faith and friendship transcend all cultural boundaries.

name: Li Wei
testimonial: The English conversation program helped me improve my language skills while building confidence. The volunteers were so patient and encouraging.

name: Fatima Al-Zahra
testimonial: ISCF provided me with a support system when I was far from home. The cultural exchange program helped me understand American culture while sharing my own heritage.

name: Kofi Asante
testimonial: The leadership training program at ISCF prepared me for my career. I learned valuable skills while serving my community and building lasting friendships.
